=== Summary ===
For the fourth time, Indymedia.be is organising an Ubuntu release/install party. The party is open to everyone who wishes to find our more about Ubuntu, wants to install it on his or her computer, or just want to come by and have a cup of coffee and talk FOSS.

See also: announcement page on Indymedia.be: http://www.indymedia.be/nl/node/29900 (Dutch).

=== Goals ===
* Present the new Ubuntu version: Intrepid Ibex 8.10.
* Meet and greet with computer enthusiasts, people who are interested in installing and/or using Ubuntu, members of the Indymedia.be community.
* To install the new Ubuntu release.
* At previous parties, there were about 20 people were present (see http://www.indymedia.be/nl/tags/ubuntu). We're hoping for a similar (or better) turnout this time.
* Have a good time, help people on the way using Ubuntu/Linux and possibly other free/open source software.

=== When? Where? ===
* Date: November 2nd 2008
* Time: 13.00 - 19.00
* Place: Indymedia.be, Haachtsesteenweg/Chauss√©e de Haecht 51, 1210 Brussels
          Near le Botanique (Botanical gardens)
